item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称未计划向中国出货 Blackwell AI 芯片
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示，该公司并没有积极讨论向中国企业出售其 Blackwell AI 芯片的事宜，从而撇清了该公司试图重返全球最大半导体市场的猜测。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said his company isn’t in active discussions to sell its Blackwell AI chips to Chinese firms, waving off speculation it’s trying to engineer a return to the world’s largest semiconductor market.】

item.title: 日本奥林巴斯在全球大调整中裁员 2000 人
item.description: 奥林巴斯公司（Olympus Corp. ）表示，该公司将裁员约 2000 人，占员工总数的 7%，以精简日本公司的结构，加快全球决策速度。【原文：Olympus Corp. said it’s cutting roughly 2,000 jobs, representing 7% of headcount, in a bid to streamline the Japanese company’s structure and speed up decision making globally.】

item.title: 印度黄金 ETF 因金银近期反弹而创下资金流入纪录
item.description: 据世界黄金协会的一份报告称，印度的黄金交易所交易基金正在创纪录地流入资金，今年的购买量已接近 30 亿美元，相当于约 26 吨贵金属。【原文：Gold exchange-traded funds in India are heading for record inflows, with this year’s purchases already close to $3 billion and translating to about 26 tons of the precious metal, according to a World Gold Council report.】

item.title: 日元疲软，股票上涨，GPIF 创 2024 年 3 月以来最佳业绩
item.description: 日本政府养老金投资基金创下了截至 2024 年 3 月的季度以来的最佳业绩，全球股市和有利的汇率波动提高了回报率。【原文：Japan’s Government Pension Investment Fund notched its best performance since the quarter ended March 2024, with global equities and favorable currency swings boosting returns.】

item.title: 越南咖啡种植大省躲过最严重台风袭击
item.description: 越南最大的咖啡生产省份达乐似乎躲过了台风 "卡尔梅吉 "最严重的袭击。【原文：Vietnam’s biggest coffee-producing province of Dak Lak appears to have dodged the worst of Typhoon Kalmaegi, according to initial assessments by an industry group after the storm made landfall overnight.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市在本周震荡下跌后保持稳定
KKR 旗下 Global Atlantic 出资 10 亿美元收购钱德拉-阿斯利的埃索公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，PT Chandra Asri Pacific Tbk 已委托 KKR & Co.【原文：PT Chandra Asri Pacific Tbk has mandated KKR & Co.’s insurance business Global Atlantic to provide financing for its $1 billion acquisition of Esso-branded service stations in Singapore from Exxon Mobil Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波兰货币政策委员会主席科特奇称波兰降息将于 2026 年初结束
item.description: 波兰货币政策委员会最大的鸽派成员之一 Ludwik Kotecki 表示，波兰很可能在 2026 年初结束目前的一系列降息行动，将基准利率维持在 3.75% 左右。【原文：Poland is likely to end its ongoing series of interest rate cuts in early 2026 with the benchmark at around 3.75%, said Ludwik Kotecki, one of the biggest doves on the country’s Monetary Policy Council.】

item.title: 英国能源价格下降，但消费者仍面临较高账单
item.description: 英国家庭正陷入一种新的能源危机：即使电力和天然气的批发价格在下降，账单也在上涨。【原文：British households are heading into a new kind of energy crisis: bills are rising even as wholesale power and gas prices are falling.】

item.title: 赢得英超联赛认可的银行专属圈子
item.description: 要想在英超联赛中取得成功，就必须付出高昂的代价，而为取得成功而大量借贷的需求也与日俱增。现在，一批新的贷款人正试图加入进来。【原文：The Premier League is an expensive competition to succeed in, and the need to borrow heavily to fund success is only increasing. A new group of lenders are now trying to muscle in.】

item.title: Centum Unit 计划推出肯尼亚首个以美元计价的房地产投资信托基金
item.description: Centum 投资公司正在等待监管部门的批准，以便在 2025 年底前发行价值 3700 万美元的房地产投资信托基金。【原文：Centum Investment Co. is waiting for regulatory approval to offer a $37 million real estate investment trust before the end of 2025.】

item.title: 菲律宾交易所总裁抨击 "末日论者 "放大股市悲观情绪
item.description: 菲律宾证券交易所负责人称，"末日论者 "加剧了全球表现最差市场的悲观情绪，并反驳了关于外国人已失去投资兴趣的说法。【原文：The head of the Philippine Stock Exchange said “doomsayers” were reinforcing pessimism in the world’s worst-performing market, pushing back against claims that foreigners have lost interest to invest.】

item.title: 瑞典公寓价格上涨预示房地产市场反弹
item.description: 瑞典的公寓价格创下了一年来的最大单月涨幅，这与最近的其他证据相呼应，表明这个北欧国家的家庭正感到更加有底气。【原文：Sweden’s apartment prices delivered their largest monthly gain in a year, echoing other recent evidence that the Nordic country’s households are feeling more emboldened.】

item.title: 日本首相高市称国家经济政策已发生变化
item.description: 日本首相佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）表示，政府实现基本收支盈余的目标是追求财政整顿的一个目标，将不再以一年为单位进行审查，而是将战略修订为在数年内实现收支平衡。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi said the government’s target of achieving a primary balance surplus, a goal in the pursuit of fiscal consolidation, would no longer be reviewed on a single-year basis, but the strategy would be revised to aim for a balance over several years.】

item.title: 中国人工智能热潮推动电力股反弹，成为下一个赢家
item.description: 由于投资者押注人工智能数据中心对能源需求的激增，中国电力股将迎来多年来表现最好的一周。【原文：Chinese power stocks are headed for their best week in years as investors bet on the surging energy demand from data centers powering artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 政府发出警告后黄金对泰铢的控制力有所减弱
item.description: 黄金对泰国货币的影响已降至近两年来的最弱水平，这表明政策制定者抑制泰铢涨势的努力可能最终会取得成效。【原文：Gold’s impact on Thailand’s currency has fallen to its weakest level in almost two years, a sign that policymakers’ efforts to curb the baht’s gains may finally be taking hold.】

item.title: 供应紧张，中国铝价接近一年来最高水平
item.description: 上海期货交易所的铝交易接近一年来的最高收盘价，因为投资者关注金属供应的收紧。【原文：Aluminum traded near its highest close in a year on the Shanghai Futures Exchange, as investors focused on tightening supply of the metal.】

item.title: 凯德置地被指酝酿与丰树合并非中国资产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，凯德置地投资有限公司（CapitaLand Investment Ltd.）正在探索各种方案，包括在与新加坡房地产资产管理公司丰树投资私人有限公司（Mapletree Investments Pte）可能进行的合并中分拆其在中国的资产。【原文：CapitaLand Investment Ltd. is exploring options including carving out its assets in China as part of a potential merger with fellow Singaporean real estate asset manager Mapletree Investments Pte, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Apple TV 流媒体服务在 "Pluribus "首映式上出现故障
item.description: 周四晚间，在广受期待的《霹雳游侠》（Breaking Bad）主创的新剧《Pluribus》首播后不久，苹果公司的流媒体服务对部分用户造成了故障。【原文：Apple Inc.’s streaming service went down for some users Thursday night shortly after the debut of the widely anticipated Pluribus, a new series from the creator of Breaking Bad.】

item.title: 需求下滑，中国大宗商品进口普遍疲软
item.description: 由于经济需求背景严峻，10 月份中国的原材料采购量普遍减少。【原文：China’s raw materials purchases broadly weakened in October due to a challenging economic backdrop for demand.】

item.title: 新加坡电信股价因数据中心报告触及 1993 年以来最高点
item.description: 新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）股价触及 1993 年以来的最高水平，原因是投资者对该公司可能进一步进军高增长的数据中心市场持乐观态度。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications Ltd. shares touched their highest level since 1993 on investor optimism for a potential further push by the company into the high-growth market for data centers.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦将通胀目标定为一位数，关键利率创历史新高
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦央行正依靠创纪录的高利率和政府最近采取的措施来控制通胀率，而通胀率是目标值的两倍多。【原文：Kazakhstan’s central bank is counting on record-high interest rates and recent government measures to rein in inflation that’s running at more than double the target.】

item.title: 铁矿石因中国钢铁需求低迷和利润率紧缩而下跌
item.description: 由于中国钢铁需求疲软和钢厂利润缩减，市场情绪受到影响，铁矿石重拾近期跌势，并创下 2 月份以来的最大单周跌幅。【原文：Iron ore resumed its recent decline and headed for the biggest weekly drop since February as weak steel demand in China and shrinking mill margins weighed on sentiment.】

item.title: 研究发现："人为 "活动抬高了多式联运市场的交易量
item.description: 根据哥伦比亚大学研究人员的一项新研究，最受欢迎的预测市场之一Polymarket的交易量因所谓的洗盘交易而大幅膨胀，在洗盘交易中，用户迅速买入和卖出相同的合约。【原文：The volume of activity on Polymarket, one of the most popular prediction markets, has been significantly inflated by so-called wash trading in which users rapidly buy and sell the same contracts, according to a new study by Columbia University researchers.】

item.title: 日本最大科技基金称人工智能股票尚未进入泡沫阶段
item.description: 日本最大的科技基金称，人工智能股票没有泡沫，还有进一步上涨的空间。【原文：Japan’s largest tech fund says AI stocks are not in a bubble and have room to rise further.】

item.title: 中国出口八个月来首次意外下降
item.description: 在与美国关系再度紧张的时期，中国 10 月份的出口意外萎缩，这对今年最后几个月本已面临放缓风险的经济造成了打击。【原文：China’s exports unexpectedly contracted in October during a period of renewed tensions with the US, dealing a blow to an economy already at risk of a slowdown in the final months of the year.】

item.title: 随着折扣增加和利润缩减，印度的快速商业竞争变得更加激烈
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 新加坡星展银行为人工智能做准备，柜员摇身一变成银行家
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）正在对员工进行新岗位再培训，以应对人工智能对工作和技能的重塑。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. is retraining its staffers for new roles as it braces for artificial intelligence to reshape jobs and skills.】

item.title: 武士债券市场迎来十多年来最繁忙的一天
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司、斯洛文尼亚和新韩银行公司周五对武士债券进行了定价，使通常低迷的日本债务市场出现了十多年来最繁忙的一天。【原文：Renault SA, Slovenia and Shinhan Bank Co. priced Samurai bonds on Friday, making it the busiest day in more than a decade in the normally subdued Japanese debt market.】

item.title: 日本和美国将联手在太平洋岛屿附近开采稀土
item.description: 日本和美国将联手在太平洋的一个小岛周围水域开采稀土，此前这两个盟国达成了一项协议，将共同努力减少对中国的稀土依赖。【原文：Japan and the US will join forces to extract rare earths in the waters around a small island in the Pacific, after the two allies struck an agreement to work together to cut their reliance on China for the critical mineral.】
